definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: tie, bind, imprison (Ar. 0’asara, As. asâru, cf. COT:Gloss, Aram. [[אֲסַר]], 03sar, Eth. 0asara: 0’a3ara:)—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. sf. [[אֲסָרָם]] Job 36:13; 3 fs. [[אָֽסְרָה]] Nu 30:5 +, etc.; Impf. [[יֶאְסׂר]] 1Ki 20:14; [[וַיֶּאֱסׂר]] Ge 42:24; [[וַיֶּאְסׂר]] Ge 46:29 +; pl. sf. [[יַאַסְרֻנִי]] Ju Jdg 16:7 etc.; Imv. [[אֱסׂר]] 1Ki 18:44, 2Ki 9:21; [[אִסְרוּ]] Je 46:4, Ps 118:27; Inf. abs. [[אָסׂר]] Ju Jdg 15:13; [[אָסוֹר]] Jdg 16:11; cstr. [[לָאְסׂר]] Nu 30:3 +; [[לָאֱסוֹר]] Ju Jdg 15:10; [[לֶאֱסָרְךָ]] Jdg 15:12; [[אָסְרָם]] Ho 10:10; Pt. act. cstr. [[אׂסְרִי]] Ge 49:11; pass. [[אָסור]] Ge 40:3 +; pl. [[אֲסוּרִים]] Ge 39:20 +; also Ju Jdg 16:21, Jdg 16:25 Qr (Kt [[אסירים]]); [[הָסוּרִים]] Ec 4:14 (cf. NOW); [[אֲסֻרוֹת]] 2Sa 3:34; cstr. [[אסורי]] Ge 39:20 Kt (Qr [[אֲסִירֵי]]);—

tie, bind, for security, foal to vine (sq. [[ל]]) Ge 49:11 (blessing of Jacob); horses and asses 2Ki 7:10, 2Ki 7:10, Ps 118:27 is dub. De bind the festal victim with cords; Che bind the procession with branches, etc.

tie, harness, kine to ([[ב]]) cart 1Sa 6:7, 1Sa 6:10; so (metaph.) Ho 10:10 harness them to ([[ל]]) their two iniquities (but Jer Ew Now make ´[[א]] here = [[יסר]] chastise, cf. [[אֶסֳּרֵם]] v:a); also sq. acc. chariot Ge 46:29 (J) Ex 14:6 (E) 2Ki 9:21; abs. 1Ki 18:44, 2Ki 9:21; even of making ready chargers [[הַסּוּסִים]] ´[[א]] Je 46:4 (‖[[עֲלוּ הַפָּרָשִׁים]]).

bind, with cords, fetters, etc., as prisoner, Simeon Ge 42:24 (E), Samson Ju Jdg 15:10, Jdg 15:12, Jdg 15:13, Jdg 15:13, Jdg 15:13, Jdg 16:5, Jdg 16:7, Jdg 16:8, Jdg 16:11, Jdg 16:11, Jdg 16:12; [[בַּנְחֻשְׁתַּיִם]] ´[[א]] 2Ki 25:7 = 2Ch 36:6 = Je 39:7, Je 52:11; also 2Ch 33:11; cf. (without ´[[בַּנ]]) 2Ki 17:4 ([[בֵּית בֶּלָא]] ´[[א]] ‖[[עָחַת ]]), 2Ki 23:33; cf. of divine chastisement Job 36:13 & v. also Ez Eze 3:25, Ps 149:8; fig. of absolute authority Ps 105:22; esp. Pt. pass. 2Sa 3:34 thy hands were not bound (‖ and thy feet not put in fetters); [[בָּאַזִקִּים]] ´[[א]] Je 40:1 cf. [[בַּזִּקִּים]] ´[[א]] Job 36:8 (prob. fig. ‖[[חַבְלֵי־עָׂנִי]]); metaph. of king held captive by a woman's tresses Ct So 7:6; perh. = imprisoned (whether bound or not) Ge 39:20 Ge 40:3, Ge 40:5 (all JE); as subst. pl. prisoners Ge 39:20 (Kt, v. supr.); so (late) as distressed, & obj. of divine compassion Is 49:9, Is 61:1, Ps 146:7; [[בֵּית האסי֠רים]] prison Ju Jdg 16:21, Jdg 16:25; cf. Ec 4:14.

gird (rare & late) [[אֵווֹר בְּמָתְנֵיהֶם]] ´[[א]] Job 12:18 ([[אֵזוֹר]] = slaves’ waistcloth, RS p. 25 supr.; Hoffm rds. [[וַיׇּסַר]] for [[וַיֶּאְסׂר]]); [[חַרְבּוֹ אֲסוּרִים עַל־מָתְנׇיו]] Ne 4:12.
sq. [[מִלְחָמָה]] begin the battle, make the attack (cf. Germ. mit jemandem anbinden) 1Ki 20:14, 2Ch 13:3.

fig. of obligation of oath or vow (only Nu 30, P) [[עַל־נֶפֶשׁ]] ´[[א]], usually sq. acc. cogn. [[אֱסָר]], [[אִסָּר]] Nu 30:3, Nu 30:5, Nu 30:5, Nu 30:6, Nu 30:8, Nu 30:9, Nu 30:11, Nu 30:12; without [[אֱסָר]] etc., v:Nu 30:7; v:Nu 30:10; cf. v:Nu 30:4 [[אִסָּר]] ´[[א]] ([[עַל־נֶפֶשׁ]] om.)
be, bound, imprisoned, Impf. (juss.) [[יֵאָסֵר]] Ge 42:19 (E); 2 ms. [[תֵּאָסֵר]] Ju Jdg 16:6, Jdg 16:10, Jdg 16:13 (of Samson); Imv. [[הֵאָֽסְרוּ]] Ge 42:16 (E).

definitions.title: Pu.
definitions.body: Pf. be taken prisoner [[אֻסְּרוּ]] Is 22:3; [[אֻסָָּרוּ]] ib.
